sentences.english: Gradually, I became uncommunicative and reserved.

sentences.english: He has an uncommunicative and eccentric disposition,and always stands aloof from anyone else.

sentences.english: In a secular society, they were forgotten in the corner.

sentences.english: Or why autism strikes boys four times as often as girls.

sentences.english: His staff play a man named Yang, withdrawn, Ne in words.

sentences.english: This child became unsociable because his parent's got a divorce.

sentences.english: They may become more solitary and even suffer from certain mental illness.

sentences.english: I was in my usual post-visit mood: tired and unsociable .

sentences.english: He became insular, emotionally dead, passionless and morose.
